original: Kellgren, Otto Leonard, stadskam-rer o. stadsombudsman, Skara, f. 18/ 3/84 i Ivö, Krist. L, av Ola K. o. Christine Olsson. G. 23 m. Karin Larsson, d. 44. — Studiex. i Kristianstad 03, jur. prel. ex. i Lund 04. Adv. t. 16, stadsstyr. sekr. o. adv. i Trollhättan 16-21, stadskamr. o. stadsomb :man i Skara sed. 21. överförmynd. i Skara sed. 24, ordf. i lokalstyr. f. Sv. Hand:-banken sed. 46. Medl. av Odd Fellow o. Frimurarorden.
translated: Kellgren, Otto Leonard, city clerk and city attorney, born in Skara on March 18th, 1884, in Ivö, Kristianstad County, to parents Ola K. and Christine Olsson. He married Karin Larsson in 1923 and she passed away in 1944. He completed his studies in Kristianstad in 1903 and obtained a preliminary law degree from Lund in 1904. He became a lawyer in 1916 and served as city council secretary and lawyer in Trollhättan from 1916 to 1921. He then became city clerk and city attorney in Skara since 1921. He was appointed guardian of minors in Skara in 1924 and became chairman of the local board of the Swedish Handelsbanken in 1946. He was a member of the Odd Fellow and Freemason orders.

structured.name: Otto Leonard Kellgren
structured.description: Otto Leonard Kellgren was a Swedish city clerk, city attorney, and lawyer. He was born on March 18th, 1884, in Ivö, Kristianstad County, Sweden, to parents Ola K. Kellgren and Christine Olsson. He married Karin Larsson in 1923, and she passed away in 1944. Otto completed his high school studies in Kristianstad in 1903 and obtained a preliminary law degree from Lund University in 1904. He became a lawyer in 1916, serving as city council secretary and lawyer in Trollhättan from 1916 to 1921. Since 1921, he held the positions of city clerk and city attorney in Skara. In 1924, he was appointed guardian of minors in Skara. In 1946, he became the chairman of the local board of the Swedish Handelsbanken. Otto Leonard Kellgren was also a member of the Odd Fellow and Freemason orders.
